summary: A follower based on a Character from my second playthrough. She's half Redguard, and half Nord. Despises vampires.
descriptionHtml:
A follower based on a Character from my second playthrough. She's half Redguard, and half Nord. Despises vampires.

She's rather basic for now. I want to do more with her in the future, including a quest and custom voice. A fire breathing half blood could use a great backstory. You may also find she's a tad imbalanced. I'll work on that.

You can find her behind Jorrvaskr in Whiterun.

Requires:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=9&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodreadme%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36913/?]MFVM[/url]

My shots use:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20483/?]Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4784/?]High Resolution Scars[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8832/?]Realistic Eye Lighting[/url]
author: Randy 355
